thread.section_title: BlogPress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlogPress | theblogpress.com
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Hi Folks,
Having just completed and very much enjoyed the 90 day training I am very much looking forward to getting my new blog underway. Jennifer has been extremely quick and responsive in answering any questions that I have had and I can tell that she really cares about we Blog Pressee`s... (if there is such a word lol) .
Blog Press takes the pressure off from the outset allowing one to concentrate on the good stuff, that is writing ones blog, which i`m sure most folk will agree counts for a lot. If you are thinking of setting up a blog my advice is, don`t hesitate - join Blog Press today!
Best regards
Mike Spearing
